column1: Table 5.6: Salient details of Imbuldanda Pathana Wewa in MWS-011

column2: 1. Desilting of the tank by 0.3 m, area 90 sqm.
2. Build a fence around the tank.
3. Provide 3000 sqm of dense randomly mixed potential natural vegetation, agave, areca, and vetiver plantation along the perimeter.
4. Reconstruct the tank around the spring that supply water to the tank. (L-2.4m, W-1.8m, H-1.2m)
